scripts.postbuild: mv build/404/index.html build/404.html && rm -r build/404 && svelte-sitemap --domain https://kilicbaran.github.io -i 'google*' -i 'blog/tag/**'
scripts.deploy: cd build && git add -A && git commit -m 'deploy' && git push git@github.com:kilicbaran/kilicbaran.github.io.git main:gh-pages
